idioms.bite the bullet: To endure a painful experience or situation (दर्दनाक अनुभव या स्थिति को सहन करना).
idioms.break the ice: To initiate a conversation in a social setting (सामाजिक वातावरण में बातचीत शुरू करना).
idioms.hit the sack: To go to bed or sleep (सोने जाना).

phrasal_verbs.bring up: To mention a topic in conversation (किसी विषय को बातचीत में लाना).
phrasal_verbs.give up: To stop trying or surrender (हार मानना या छोड़ देना).
phrasal_verbs.look after: To take care of someone or something (किसी का ध्यान रखना).
phrasal_verbs.abide by: To follow or obey a rule, decision, or law (नियम, निर्णय या कानून का पालन करना).
phrasal_verbs.abound in: To exist in large numbers or quantities (बहुतायत में होना).
phrasal_verbs.abound with: To be filled with something in great quantity (किसी चीज़ से भरा होना).
phrasal_verbs.accede to: To agree to a request or demand, often after initial resistance (अक्सर प्रारंभिक विरोध के बाद किसी अनुरोध या मांग से सहमत होना).
phrasal_verbs.accord with: To be consistent or in agreement with something (किसी चीज़ के साथ संगत या सहमत होना).
phrasal_verbs.account for: To explain or justify something (किसी चीज़ की व्याख्या या औचित्य बताना).
phrasal_verbs.add up: To make sense or seem reasonable (समझ में आना या उचित लगना).
phrasal_verbs.add up to: To result in a total amount or effect (कुल राशि या प्रभाव में परिणत होना).
phrasal_verbs.adhere to: To stick firmly to a rule, belief, or surface (किसी नियम, विश्वास, या सतह पर दृढ़ता से बने रहना).
phrasal_verbs.adjourn to: To move to another place for a meeting or activity (किसी बैठक या गतिविधि के लिए दूसरी जगह जाना).
phrasal_verbs.agree with: To share the same opinion as someone else or be beneficial to someone’s health (किसी और की राय से सहमत होना या किसी के स्वास्थ्य के लिए लाभकारी होना).
phrasal_verbs.ace out: To narrowly defeat someone or achieve something successfully (किसी को थोड़ा-सा हराना या सफलतापूर्वक कुछ हासिल करना).
phrasal_verbs.ache for: To strongly desire or yearn for something (किसी चीज़ की तीव्र इच्छा या लालसा करना).
phrasal_verbs.act out: To perform or express emotions through actions, sometimes disruptively (क्रियाओं के माध्यम से भावनाओं का प्रदर्शन या व्यक्त करना, कभी-कभी विघटनकारी ढंग से).
phrasal_verbs.act up: To behave badly or not function properly (खराब व्यवहार करना या सही ढंग से काम नहीं करना).
phrasal_verbs.aim at: To direct efforts, attention, or a weapon towards something (किसी चीज़ की ओर प्रयास, ध्यान, या हथियार निर्देशित करना).
phrasal_verbs.allow for: To consider or include something as a possibility (किसी चीज़ को संभावना के रूप में मानना या शामिल करना).
phrasal_verbs.allow of: To permit or leave room for something (किसी चीज़ की अनुमति देना या जगह छोड़ना).
phrasal_verbs.allude to: To refer to something indirectly (किसी चीज़ का अप्रत्यक्ष रूप से उल्लेख करना).
phrasal_verbs.amount to: To equal or add up to a specific total or effect (किसी विशिष्ट कुल राशि या प्रभाव के बराबर होना या जोड़ना).

words.happy: A feeling of joy, pleasure, or contentment.
words.fast: Moving quickly or able to perform at high speed.
words.strong: Having great physical power or mental determination.
words.intelligent: Having the ability to acquire and apply knowledge and skills.
words.brave: Showing courage and willingness to face danger.
words.accept: To agree to take or receive something offered (स्वीकार करना).
words.allow: To permit something to happen or someone to do something (अनुमति देना).
words.ask: To put a question to someone (पूछना).
words.believe: To accept that something is true (विश्वास करना).
words.borrow: To take and use something belonging to someone else with the intention of returning it (उधार लेना).
words.bring: To take or carry someone or something to a place (लाना).
words.build: To construct something by putting parts or materials together (निर्माण करना).
words.buy: To acquire something in exchange for money (खरीदना).
words.call: To communicate with someone by phone or shout to attract their attention (बुलाना).
words.cancel: To decide that something already planned will not happen (रद्द करना).
words.clean: To remove dirt from something (साफ करना).
words.come: To move towards or arrive at a specified place (आना).
words.complain: To express dissatisfaction or annoyance about something (शिकायत करना).
words.cough: To expel air from the lungs suddenly with a sharp sound (खांसना).
words.count: To determine the total number of items in a group (गिनना).
words.cut: To divide something into pieces with a sharp tool (काटना).
words.dance: To move rhythmically to music (नृत्य करना).
words.draw: To produce a picture or diagram by making lines on a surface (चित्र बनाना).
words.drive: To operate and control the direction and speed of a motor vehicle (चलाना).
words.eat: To put food into the mouth, chew it, and swallow it (खाना).
words.explain: To make something clear or easy to understand (समझाना).
words.fall: To move downward, typically rapidly and freely without control (गिरना).
words.find: To discover something unexpectedly or by searching (ढूँढना).
words.fix: To repair something that is broken or damaged (ठीक करना).
words.fly: To move through the air using wings (उड़ना).
words.give: To present something voluntarily without expecting anything in return (देना).
words.go: To move from one place to another (जाना).
words.have: To possess, own, or hold something (होना).
words.hear: To perceive sound via the ear (सुनना).
words.help: To assist someone in doing something (मदद करना).
words.hide: To put something in a place where it cannot be seen or found (छिपाना).
words.hit: To strike someone or something with force (मारना).
words.hold: To grasp or support something with one's hands (पकड़ना).
words.hope: To desire something to happen or be the case (आशा करना).
words.hug: To hold someone tightly in one's arms, typically to express affection (गले लगाना).
words.jump: To push oneself off a surface and into the air by using the muscles in one's legs and feet (कूदना).
words.keep: To have or retain possession of something (रखना).
words.know: To be aware of through observation, inquiry, or information (जानना).
words.laugh: To make sounds and movements of the face and body that usually express amusement (हंसना).
words.learn: To acquire knowledge or skill through study or experience (सीखना).
words.leave: To go away from a place (छोड़ना).
words.lend: To give something to someone for a short time, expecting it to be returned (उधार देना).
words.let: To allow or permit someone to do something (अनुमति देना).
words.like: To find something agreeable or enjoyable (पसंद करना).
words.live: To remain alive or exist (जीवित रहना).
words.look: To direct one's gaze in a specified direction (देखना).
words.lose: To be deprived of or cease to have something (खोना).
words.love: To feel deep affection for someone (प्रेम करना).
words.need: To require something because it is essential or very important (जरूरत होना).
words.open: To move something so that it is no longer closed (खोलना).
words.paint: To cover a surface with color using a brush (रंग करना).
words.play: To engage in an activity for enjoyment and recreation (खेलना).
words.put: To move something into a specified position (रखना).
words.read: To look at and comprehend the meaning of written or printed matter (पढ़ना).
words.remember: To have in or be able to bring to one's mind an awareness of someone or something from the past (याद रखना).
words.run: To move at a speed faster than a walk (दौड़ना).
words.say: To utter words to convey information or express a feeling (कहना).
words.sell: To give something in exchange for money (बेचना).
words.send: To cause something to go or be taken to a particular destination (भेजना).
words.show: To display or allow to be perceived (दिखाना).
words.sing: To produce musical tones with the voice (गाना).
words.sit: To rest with the body supported by the buttocks or thighs (बैठना).
words.sleep: To rest by closing the eyes and becoming unconscious (सोना).
words.speak: To say words in order to express thoughts or feelings (बोलना).
words.spend: To use money to pay for something (खर्च करना).
words.stand: To be in an upright position on the feet (खड़ा होना).
words.study: To devote time and attention to acquiring knowledge (पढ़ाई करना).
words.swim: To move through water by moving the body or parts of the body (तैरना).
words.take: To acquire possession, control, or occupancy of something (लेना).
words.talk: To express thoughts, feelings, or information by speaking (बात करना).
words.teach: To impart knowledge or instruct someone (पढ़ाना).
words.tell: To communicate information, facts, or news to someone (बताना).
words.think: To have a particular opinion, belief, or idea about someone or something (सोचना).
words.throw: To propel something with force through the air by a movement of the arm and hand (फेंकना).
words.touch: To come into or be in contact with something (छूना).
words.travel: To make a journey, typically of some length (यात्रा करना).
words.try: To make an attempt or effort to do something (प्रयास करना).
words.turn: To move or cause to move in a circular direction around an axis or point (मोड़ना).
words.use: To take, hold, or deploy something as a means of accomplishing a purpose (उपयोग करना).
words.wait: To stay where one is or delay action until a particular time (इंतजार करना).
words.wake: To emerge or cause to emerge from sleep (जागना).
words.walk: To move at a regular pace by lifting and setting down each foot in turn (चलना).
words.want: To have a desire to possess or do something (चाहना).
words.watch: To look at or observe attentively over a period of time (देखना).
words.wear: To have clothing, jewelry, etc., on one's body (पहनना).
words.win: To be successful or victorious in a contest or conflict (जीतना).
words.work: To engage in physical or mental activity in order to achieve a result (काम करना).
words.worry: To give way to anxiety or unease; allow one's mind to dwell on difficulty or troubles (चिंता करना).
